text: Sphingomonas gimensis is a Gram-negative and rod-shaped bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from a lead and zinc mine in Meizhou in the Guangdong Province in China.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen UniProt == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas gimensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase gimensis Category:Bacteria described in 2014
title: Sphingomonas gimensis
